item.title: How to Write Usefully
item.author: 作者
item.description: 什么样的Essay算一篇好Essay，很多人说具有说服力就算一篇好Essay，对此Paulhttp://www.paulgraham.com

item.title: EnglishPod
item.author: 作者
item.description: 听力文本 Elementary ‐ Difficult Customer (B0001) A: Good evening. My name is Fabio, I’ll be your waiter for tonight. May I take your order? B: No, I’m still working on it. This menu is not even in English. What’s good here? A: For you sir, I would recommend spaghetti and meatballs. B: Does it come with coke
